column1: Sagalo  is a remote village and rural commune in the Cercle of Kéniéba in the Kayes Region of south-western Mali. It lies near the border with Guinea. The commune includes 17 villages and at the time of the 2009 census had a population of 15
Plan de Sécurité Alimentaire Commune Rurale de Sagalo 2007-2011 (PDF) (in French)
